content: SIW 4AT-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench Compact-class cordless impact wrench with the ultimate balance of power and handling (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Impact drivers and wrenches- - - ### FEATURES:Features The ideal cordless impact wrench for non-structural fastening, such as MEP supports and handrails Longer tool lifetime – brushless motor means the impact wrench lasts longer and gets more work done per charge Faster anchor setting with more control – three speed settings and improved LED light On the Nuron battery platform – cordless impact wrenches without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, time-saving accessories and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Setting HUS anchors in concrete – such as for baseplates, formwork props, handrails and temporary fixtures (1/4” to 5/8” diameter) Metal bolting in steel – such as handrails, racking and machinery (3/8” to 1/2” diameter) Lag bolting in wood – such as for wooden roofs or temporary structures (up to 3/8” diameter) Setting wedge anchors in concrete (3/8” to 5/8” diameter) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Anvil type: 1/2 detent pin Maximum torque: 66 ft-lbs (1); 100 ft-lbs (2); 157 ft-lbs (3) Nut busting torque: 249 ft-lbs Technical Data | Anvil type | 1/2 detent pin | Maximum torque | 66 ft-lbs (1); 100 ft-lbs (2); 157 ft-lbs (3) | 1 | Nut busting torque | 249 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 3500 impacts/minute | Number of gears | 3 | No load RPM | gear 1: 1000 rpm; gear 2: 1500 rpm; gear 3: 2300 rpm | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 6 x 2.7 x 8.5 mm | Tool body weight | 2.3 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 96 dB (A) | 2 | Do not use the tool for applications where an exact torque or maximum torque is specified - there is a risk of over-tightening and damaging the screw or workpiece. | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3854545 - SIW 4AT-22 + B22 85 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SIW 4AT-22 Cordl. imp. wrench - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 2x B 22-85 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 2291232 - SIW 4AT-22 1/2 impact wrench - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SIW 4AT-22 Cordl. imp. wrench
